name: Balloon Battle
description:
Balloon Battle is a two player versus shoot-em-up! Shoot down the other player's balloon, first to five wins! Each player shares the keyboard to play as a balloon.

Player 1 Controls

  • W - move up
  • S - move down
  • Q / A - aim cannon on the left
  • E / D - aim cannon on the right
  • X - shoot cannon

Player 2 Controls

  • I - move up
  • K - move down
  • U / J - aim cannon on the left
  • O / L - aim cannon on the right
  • < - shoot cannon
